== Video Overview ==

This video describes how to manage files on the local hard disks and removable drives.

== Target Audience ==

* Users who would like to become familiar with file navigation in a GUI on Linux.

== Pre-requisites ==

* None.

== Required Knowledge ==

* Awareness of basic filesystem objects (files and folders).

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* None.

== Objectives ==

* Learn how to view files 
* Learn how to organise and find files
* Copying and cutting and pasting
* Creating folders and navigating around them
* Renaming files
